subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rick Ankiel homered twice and had three runs batted in, the latest power display by the former pitcher, as the St. Louis Cardinals defeated the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers, 6-1.
snippet: Rick Ankiel homered twice and had three runs batted in, the latest power display by the former pitcher, as the St. Louis Cardinals defeated the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers, 6-1.
